article_title: Sticking to the script in Alabama
article_text:
Anniston, AL (36206)

Today

Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 88F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low near 65F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , alabama legislature, alabama politics, donald trump, 1901 constitution
article_metadata.author: the editorial board of The Anniston Star

og.description: Donald Trump is the focus of an intense debate among Republicans at the moment. Republicans, especially ones holding high elected office, face a series of options: Support him, distance from
